title: Big newsrooms pave the way for AI agents in journalism
description: In 2025, you probably heard the word “agents” used more often in conversations about AI. In a newsroom context, that might mean agents that look at content you’re creating and provide additional context that may be relevant in the research and editing process. It’s worth noting that the concept of an AI agent is not...
